mapper.insert: insert into moneyfs_1( id, mid, fsid, gemsid, amount, dt_add, dt_edit, remark, moneyid, status, bintype, fctype )values( #{id}, #{mid}, #{fsid}, #{gemsid}, #{amount}, #{dt_add}, #{dt_edit}, #{remark}, #{moneyid}, #{status}, #{bintype}, #{fctype} )

insert into moneyfs_2( id, mid, fsid, gemsid, amount, dt_add, dt_edit, remark, moneyid, status, bintype, bc_type, orderid, type )values( #{id}, #{mid}, #{fsid}, #{gemsid}, #{amount}, #{dt_add}, #{dt_edit}, #{remark}, #{moneyid}, #{status}, #{bintype}, #{bc_type}, #{orderid}, #{type} )
